title: Vinyl Record - LP Watch Face
summary: Unique animated watch face - a tribute to the warm era of old record players.
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
Are you a retro style fan, love old school LP records or just appreciate fine-crafted watch faces? Then this stylish, smoothly animated Vinyl Record watch face is just for you!

There’s nothing like a warm, fuzzy sound of LP record player. This unique watch face is a tribute to that era and that feeling. Great both for men and women, with 4 distinct, detailed designs to choose from.

🌟Main features:
- Choice of 4 unique sticker styles (classic, warm, retro, and disco);
- Great smooth animation;
- Smart ambient mode;
- Different time formats;
- Displays date.

⌚Is it for me?
Vinyl Record is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG G Watch R;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, Samsung Gear S2 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Vinyl Record Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Drop the needle and let the warm music embrace the air.🎺🎙
And don't forget to check out our store for more fine-crafted watch faces🙊
comments: This is being really picky here but the layout needs looking at regarding the tonearm layout and it's also pretty hard to see the time.....
Excellent watch face looks great...could do with more designs.
Buggy but cool Looks great but doesn't not update time zone. I have to switch to another watch face and back every time I change time zones. T mobile lg g4 and lg g watch r.
